article_title: TelexFree to Get a Bankruptcy Trustee as Fraud Charges Loom
article_text:
A Massachusetts bankruptcy judge on Tuesday signaled he will move quickly to appoint a Chapter 11 trustee to take control of TelexFree LLC, which faces accusations of operating a $1 billion-plus pyramid scheme.

Judge Melvin Hoffman of the U.S. Bankruptcy Court in Worcester, Mass., said that once additional paperwork is on file, he would approve the appointment of the trustee, an independent outsider who will replace the company's...
